DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare effectiveness efficiency miniscrew-supported standard frog molar distalizing appliance .
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomize clinical trial study carry twenty healthy Egyptian subject , require molar distalization part comprehensive orthodontic treatment . The subject select treated outpatient clinic Orthodontic Department , Faculty Dentistry , Ain-Shams University . The inclusion criterion subject selection study follow ; 1 . All subject age range 11 16 year mean ±13.5 year . 2 . All subject skeletal Class 1 mild skeletal Class 2 due maxillary excess . 3 . All subject bilateral Class II molar relationship . 4 . All subject free dental anomaly . 5 . All subject good oral hygiene . The exclusion criterion study follow ; 1- Missing permanent teeth exception 3rd molar . 2- Previous orthodontic treatment . 3- Systemic disease may influence orthodontic treatment drug intake . 4- Periodontal disease . 5- Functional mandibular deviation facial asymmetry . 6- History parafunctional habit . The subject equally randomly divide two group ; group A group B include ten subject per group . These group classify accord type distalizer utilize : - Group A : include ten subject utilizing conventional frog molar distalizing appliance ( CF ) . - Group B : include ten subject utilize Miniscrews-supported frog molar distalizing appliance ( MSF ) The pretreatment post-distalization Database Records All subject following record ; clinical diagnostic sheet , orthodontic study cast ( accord ABO index ) , extraoral intraoral photograph , CBCT . These record obtain T1 distalization T2 distalization . The study protocol approve local ethic committee , faculty dentistry , Ain-Shams University . Before commence treatment , subject guardian receive full explanation treatment protocol . After ask sign detail write consent .
DOC.criteria: 1 . All subject age range 11 16 year mean ±13.5 year . 2 . All subject skeletal Class 1 mild skeletal Class 2 due maxillary excess . 3 . All subject bilateral Class II molar relationship . 4 . All subject free dental anomaly . 5 . All subject good oral hygiene . 1 . Missing permanent teeth exception 3rd molar . 2 . Previous orthodontic treatment . 3 . Systemic disease may influence orthodontic treatment drug intake . 4 . Periodontal disease . 5 . Functional mandibular deviation facial asymmetry . 6 . History parafunctional habit .
